answers.answer: Btw I'm 26 weeks
Me too boo :/ i lost the 15 then gained 5 back in 2 months and I've gained 12 this months :( I'm only 2 pounds over my prego pregnancy weight but still...it sounds like a lot to me lol
Pre pregnancy **
I'm still about 10 under my pre preg weight but still, I was getting so used to stepping on the scale and seeing the numbers drop instead of rise.
Lol i gained almost 4 pounds aweek in my 8th month
Well hopefully we can used it as motivation to get the weight off after baby gets here lol
Goodness. I'm thinking about eating all baked chicken and steamed veggies and depriving my self of all cravings lol there is no way I can gain 10 pounds each month.
Thats the sucky part of preclampsia you can retaine alot of water weight.
You can say,sucky on here? SUCKY SUCKY SUCKY!!

Riiiggghhhttt!!! I sure would miss my fudge brownies though...lol i guess I'm just going to Go back to only drinking water and tea. I've been slacking and guzzling mt dew lately (which i hated before i got pregnant)
Lol @searra! Nice find! Also if you exagerate damnnn or biiitchhhh lol
Coool beans!! Suuuccckkyyy!!!! Lol
Haha preeclampsia is def SUCKY.
I had preeclampsia with my first I put on 20 lbs in a month. It was brutal. I'm really hoping I don't get it this time around.
I'm there with you.. I've lost a total of 21 pounds, but lately it feels like I'm always hungry/ eating.. I'm scared of packing them back on, but can't seem to help it... Currently 19 weeks gulp!
I was diagnosed with preeclampsia last week but I didn't think it could make me gain so fast and so early
Lots of water and keep those feet up!
I didn't gain any during my first 24 weeks and then I gained 20 during the lat half of my pregnancy. I think it's pretty normal but still quite a shock.

The term "lard bucket" also had me laughing :-) try not to worry too much on the wait gain you'll soon loose it after and pre-eclempsia is not going to be doing you any favours. Sorry just have to say it too...SUCKY!!!! :-)

With me it hasn't mattered what I've ate, the weight went on. I was 125 pounds pre pregnancy and now I'm about 175. I was slim before now I feel like a whale. It's hard I know but try not to worry you put the weight on so u can breast feed later.
Haha hopefully it comes off pretty fast
For the record. I have looked at your pics and you look beautiful. :)

question: So my first 20 weeks, I lost a bunch of weight from morning sickness, and now I'm gaining weight FAST! I've gained 10 pounds in a month, and that's just ridiculous for me because I'm already overweight. Is it common to gain weight so fast after losing so much weight?
title: I feel like a total lard bucket
